UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Solution structures of the antifungal heliomicin and a selected variant with both antibacterial and antifungal activities.
Literature.Author: Lamberty M, Caille A, Landon C, Tassin-Moindrot S, Hetru C, Bulet P, Vovelle F

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Neurospora crassa CBS 327-54(MIC=3µM),Fusarium culmorum IMI 180420(MIC=6µM),Fusarium haematococcum 160.2.2(MIC=12µM),Micrococcus luteus A270(MIC=50µM),Bacillus megaterium(no activity data),Escherichia coli D22(no activity data)
